title: Lesson 08 - One Minute Mandarin
description: In lesson 8 of One Minute Mandarin you will learn to count from one to ten. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute Mandarin at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com. One Minute Mandarin is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.
